question: Which of the following has proposed the Public Data Office Providers by enhancing Wi-Fi connectivity and cutting internet costs by up to 90%?
explanation: TRAI has proposed the concept of Public Data Office Providers, aimed at enhancing Wi-Fi connectivity and cutting internet costs by up to 90%. TRAI recommended an ambitious model of a public Wi-Fi grid that also aims to push broadband proliferation in the country. The grid or the mesh conceptualised by TRAI entails multiple providers coming together on one platform.
